endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: format

param_schema.title: Format
param_schema.description: Output format (e.g., png, jpg). Defaults to png.

parameters.description: Output format (e.g., png, jpg). Defaults to png.

parameters.name: reverse

param_schema.title: Reverse
param_schema.description: If True, remove the foreground instead of the background.

parameters.description: If True, remove the foreground instead of the background.

parameters.name: threshold

param_schema.title: Threshold
param_schema.description: Threshold for hard segmentation (0.0-1.0). If 0.0, uses soft alpha.

parameters.description: Threshold for hard segmentation (0.0-1.0). If 0.0, uses soft alpha.

parameters.name: background_type

param_schema.title: Background Type
param_schema.description: Background type: 'rgba', 'map', 'green', 'white', [R,G,B] array, 'blur', 'overlay', or path to an image.

parameters.description: Background type: 'rgba', 'map', 'green', 'white', [R,G,B] array, 'blur', 'overlay', or path to an image.
